data.name: Apotheorasis • Lab of the Blind Gods | Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Download the Voice & Piano tracks present in Apotheorasis.

The game's 3D audio engine is in full effect, the post-processing effects are mellowed out for a better listening experience, and only a couple of Voice Lines have been left in, to take you back into the lab of the blind gods.

Also contains the raw recorded files for those tracks, and a bonus full rendition of the base track (not present in the game) from which we improvised everything else.
data.about_the_game:
Download the Voice & Piano tracks present in Apotheorasis.

The game's 3D audio engine is in full effect, the post-processing effects are mellowed out for a better listening experience, and only a couple of Voice Lines have been left in, to take you back into the lab of the blind gods.

Also contains the raw recorded files for those tracks, and a bonus full rendition of the base track (not present in the game) from which we improvised everything else.
data.short_description: A first person 3D action thriller and a blind protagonist walk into a lab. A lab where newborn gods struggle, hope and despair. To survive, you may have to rely on the ones responsible for this mess. Learn what you are and dream of who you could be.

fullgame.name: Apotheorasis • Lab of the Blind Gods

Minimum:
  • Storage: 46 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 269 MB available space
